content: सांद्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Close, compact, having no interstices. {@--2@} Coarse, gross, thick, dense; दुर्वर्णभित्तिरिह सांद्रसुधासवर्णा <ls>Śi. 4. 28</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 4.">64</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">9. 15</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 41</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Clustered together, collected. {@--4@} Stout, strong, robust. {@--5@} Excessive, abundant, much; सांद्रानंदक्षुभितहृदयप्रस्रवेणेव सिक्तः <ls>U. 7. 22.</ls> {@--6@} Intense, strong, vehement; व्याप्तांतराः सांद्रकुतूहलानां <ls>R. 7. 11</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 37.</ls> {@--7@} Unctuous, oily, viscid. {@--8@} Bland, soft, smooth. {@--9@} Pleasing, agreeable. --द्रः {@--1@} A heap, cluster. {@--2@} A thicket, wood.
